DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study investigate effect 40 mg dose rosuvastatin carotid plaque inflammation measure MRI PET scanning , evaluate whether technique promise future proof principle study . A number patient receive placebo control .
DOC.criteria: Subjects noncalcified plaque least 2 mm least 6 mm length first MR scan uptake contrast agent dynamic MRI scan Signed write Informed Consent . Healthy men 18 70 year , woman 60 70 Use statin within six month randomization . Use lipid alter medication statin within last six month . Clinical evidence metabolic vascular disease require statin lipid lower pharmacological nonpharmacological treatment . Total cholesterol > 8 , LDLC > 6 TG > 6 mmol/L enrolment
